A4.text: They missed postseason play entirely for the first time since the 1965–66 season

A5.text: After bringing in one of the top 5 incoming classes for the 2002–2003 season, the Tar Heels started the season by knocking off a top 5 Kansas team and going on to win the Preseason NIT and returning to the AP top 25.
